org.jl7.hl7
Class HL7Message

java.lang.Object
  org.jl7.hl7.HL7Message

public class HL7Message
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an HL7 message

Field Detail

segmentTerminator

public static char segmentTerminator
Character used to mark the end of a segment and the beginning of the next segment (i.e. segment delimiter). Default: ASCII 10

Since:
0.1

fieldSeparator

public char fieldSeparator
Character used to mark the end of a field and the beginning of the next // * field (i.e. field delimiter). Default: |

Since:
0.1

componentSeparator

public char componentSeparator
Character used to mark the end of a component and the beginning of the next component (i.e. component delimiter). Default: ^

Since:
0.1

subcomponentSeparator

public char subcomponentSeparator
Character used to mark the end of a subcomponent and the beginning of the next subcomponent (i.e. subcomponent delimiter). Default: &

Since:
0.1

repetitionSeparator

public char repetitionSeparator
Character used to mark the end of a field repetition and the beginning of the next field repetition (i.e. field repetition delimiter). Default: ~

Since:
0.1

escapeCharacter

public char escapeCharacter
Character used to escape characters which would otherwise be interpreted. Default: \

Since:
0.1

segments

private java.util.List<HL7Segment> segments
List of all segments in this message.

getSegmentGroups

public java.util.List<HL7SegmentGroup> getSegmentGroups(java.lang.String segmentTypes)
Returns a list of segment groups where each group starts with the first segment of one of the given types and ends with the last segment before a segment of one of the given types e.g. if the message contains the following segments: MSH PID PV1 PV2 PID PV1 PID PV1 PV2, the following groups will be returned:
  • PID PV1 PV2
  • PID PV1
  • PID PV1 PV2

Parameters:
segmentType - segment types (separated by pipes) to be searched for
segmentList - list of segments to be processed.
Returns:
a list of segment groups
Since:
0.1

addSegment

public void addSegment(java.lang.String segment,
                       java.lang.String delimiters,
                       boolean escapesInSubcomponents)
Adds a segment at the end of this message.

Parameters:
segment - string representing the segment to be added
delimiters - a string containing all delimiters defined for this message: fieldSeparator + componentSeparator + repetitionSeparator + escapeCharacter + subcomponentSeparator
escapesInSubcomponents - whether escape characters are used or not
Since:
0.1

addSegment

public static HL7Message addSegment(HL7Message message,
                                    HL7Segment segment)
Adds a segment at the end of the message.

Parameters:
message - message to which the segment should be added
segment - segment to be added
Returns:
the input message (with the additional segment)
Since:
0.1
